verses.name: John 7:37
verses.text: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

verses.name: John 7:38
verses.text: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

verses.name: John 7:39
verses.text: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

verses.name: John 7:40
verses.text: Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.
